For those who are fans of the Peacemaker Kurogane Series and Nanae Chrno's depiction of the Shinsengumi:

Animebooks (based out of West Coast) has this new artbook in stock. 
http://www.animebooks.com/nachilku.html
Nanae Chrono Illustrations - Kuronoga


Nanae Chrono is the artist of the popular "Peace Maker Kurogane" series. This is the first illustrations book from this artist.

84 pages. Measures 10.5" X 10.2". Text in Japanese. 


Sasuga (based out of East Coast) 
http://www.sasugabooks.com/product_info.php?products_id=33767


This will certainly save some of you the cost of ordering from Amazon.jp .

S
